attributes.action: prevent the redesignation of Broomhill Bank Special needs school for girls in Rusthall near Tunbridge Wells, Kent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Specifically we ask that you prevent the introduction of boys into the school, the closure of the 16+ unit which teaches the girls how to be independent and the closure of the boarding facilities which form a critical part of their independence training.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent the redesignation of Broomhill Bank Special needs school for girls in Rusthall near Tunbridge Wells, Kent."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13096.asp
